TextView.android:text: Events or Out of Blue\n由于事件还是具体原因
Duration: weeks, months or years\n持续时间：年、月、周
How well did treatment work?\n治疗效果如何
LTE1 Marital separation/divorce\nLTE1 夫妻分居/离婚
LTE2 Major injury or traffic accident\nLTE2 严重创伤或车祸
LTE3 Loss of job/retirement\nLTE3 失业/下岗/退休
LTE4 Death /major illness of spouse\nLTE4 配偶死亡或患重病
LTE5 Business bankrupt\nLTE5 营企业或家庭经济破产
LTE6 Death/major illness of other close family member\nLTE6 家庭其他成员死亡或患重病
LTE7 Violence\nLTE7 遭到暴力打击/被强暴
LTE8 Major natural disaster (e.g. flood drought)\nLTE8 严重自然灾害（如旱、涝等）
LTE9 Major conflict within family\nLTE9 严重的家庭内部矛盾及冲突
LTE10 Loss of income / living on debt\nLTE10 丧失经济来源/负债度日
